text.*:
The University System of Taipei (USTP, 臺北聯合大學系統) is a university alliance in Taiwan. Its constituents are:

  • National Taipei University (NTPU)
  • National Taipei University of Technology (Taipei Tech)
  • Taipei Medical University (TMU)
  • National Taiwan Ocean University (NTOU)

Rankings[edit]

University System of Taipei
Institution 2014 ARWU[1] 2014 QS World 2014 THE World 2015 QS Asia[2] 2015 THE Asia[3] 2015 THE BRICs[4]
TMU NR 379 NR 47 NR 75
Taipei Tech NR 551-600 NR 124 NR 66
NTOU NR NR NR 201-250 NR 84
NTPU NR NR NR 251-300 NR NR
